data.title: Reimagining Agile
data.description: Aimed at creating a collaborative environment for people to share their experiences and thoughts of Agile. Uses Statamic as a headless CMS, dynamically importing selected components to allow for ultimate customisation.

data.title: Adaptavist
data.description: Website for Adaptavist, the home of digital transformation. Led a comprehensive rebuild of the homepage to improve UX and performance, the impact of which is still visible today, as well as fully automating the deployment process.

data.title: Freedom To Invest
data.description: A smaller project for a client who's website needed to be brought up to date. Improved performance, accessibility and SEO whilst adding new features but still maintaining the overall look and feel.
